thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 54 of 7211
thread.title: CJNC

author: CJNC
title: CJNC
text: I've been purchasing from BH Photo for 10 years or more. I started using them for professional camera equipment and lenses and then discovered everything else they offer. Their knowledge, their inventory, the service, shipping and quality of products sold is outstanding. I never have any reservations about ordering something from BH Photo because I know they stand by their products/shipping/return policy. I've since purchased video cameras, printers, Apple Watch and used equipment from them and all are absolutely outstanding. The user reviews for the individual products are probably the most reliable I've seen. If you want to know about a lens, camera, printer, etc., just read the user reviews for the item at BH Photo.
